summary: Completed frontend testing for Zeina & Khazina Arabic RTL gold trading app. All requested features are working correctly: Designers page, About page, Sharia page, navigation changes, and profile menu links.
passed_tests: Homepage loads with gold prices and quick access section
Designers page (/designers) loads with 12 designer cards
About page (/about) loads with full content
About page shows 'لماذا تختارنا' section and payment methods
Sharia page (/sharia) loads with Islamic terms
Sharia page has acceptance checkbox and button
Profile page shows 'الشروط الشرعية' link when logged in
Profile page shows 'عن زينة وخزينة' link when logged in
Navigation from profile to Sharia page works
Navigation from profile to About page works
Admin login successful with provided credentials
RTL layout working correctly across all pages
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features are working. Designers page shows 12 designers from API. About and Sharia pages are static content pages. Profile menu has 7 items including Sharia and About links. Bottom nav has 5 items: الرئيسية, الاستثمار, الهدايا, المجوهرات, المصممات
